snippet.title: Bishi Bashi Channel at Arcade Club
snippet.description:
The newest title in the much loved Bishi Bashi series, Bishi Bashi Channel (2018) is a competitive video game made up of a variety of crazy yet addictive mini-games. From racing kittens to hiding from zombies, playing Bishi Bashi channel really is an experience like no other!

Unlike previous games in this beloved series the game cabinet now allows up to four players to go head-to-head. In addition to which, two teams of two players can also battle one another, allowing groups such as families or friends to compete for ultimate Bishi Bashi supremacy!

So head on down to Floor 2 to see what all the fuss is about, be assured, you wont regret it!
